fulltext:
Pham Van Phuc
Backend Developer
04/1994   Male  
(+84) 399 346 949

phuc.pham.itf@gmail.com

 
Go Vap - Ho Chi Minh - Viet Nam

https://www.linkedin.com/in/phuc-
pham-itf/
EDUCATION
Da nang university of technology and sciences (8/2012 > 08/2017)
Major: Information of Technology.
Degree: IT engineer
OBJECTIVE
- Seeking for a challenging workplace
that welcomes innovative ideas and
offers growth opportunities and a
positive environment for accomplishing
projects.
- Earn experience, improve personal skill
to be an expert and achieve tech leaders
position.
EXPERIENCES
Code Engine Studio (11/2016 > 6/2018)
FullStack developer
* Time tracker
- Build a time tracker application like Toggl. 
- Implement backend APIs for user tracking time, project
management, leave management.
- Implement Front-end for leave management.
- Technologies used: Ruby on Rails and Angular 2.
* Zilly (Tellus for now http://www.zillyhome.com/)
- Join to build a rental home management application.
- Implement backend APIs, lease management, properties
management.
- Implement chat using SendBird and internal web socket. 
- Implement APIs documentations using SwaggerUI.
- Join to build data searchable by search engine Elasticsearch.
- Technologies used: Ruby on Rails, Postgresql, Elasticsearch.
* Sitetheory (https://sitetheory.io/)
- Develop and maintain CMS websites from US client for dynamic
creating a web site without the need of code knowledge.
- Technologies used: Symfony and Angular 1.
SKILLS
Ruby on rails
Blockchain
Kafka Confluent
Schema-registry
Zookeeper
PostgreSQL
Docker vs Kubernetes
AWS EC2, Scaleway
Cloud Platform,
Heroku
Microservices and
Monolithic
architecture
Design patterns
ElasticSearch
Git
Rspec Test
- Accumulated skills: Rails, Angular 1 - 2, Elasticsearch,
Postgresql, Pusher, Heroku, Stripe and Dwolla,  SendBird - Chat
platform, Rspec, Cucumber.
- Working in an Agile Scrum team with 25 members around the
world.
Ipcoin exchange (8/2018 > Ongoing)
Backend developer
- Join to build a crypto exchange like forex exchange.
- Join to build a trading platform, order machine engine.
- Integrate crypto wallet, BTC, NEO ... 
- Build and run a system using Docker and Kubernetes.
- Build a distributed system, follow close to the microservice
architecture using event-sourcing with Kafka, RabbitMQ.
- Apply much design pattern on implementing the system.
- Technologies used: Ruby on rails, blockchain, docker.
- Accumulated skills: ruby on rails, PostgreSQL, blockchain,
confluent Kafka, microservice, docker, Kubenetes, Rspec ...
LANGUAGES
ENGLISH ( Intermediate )
VIETNAMESE ( Native )
HOBBIES-PERSONALITY
* Love to join social
activities and
community.
* Curious about
technology and
compute science.
* Creative and
humorous mind.
* Love reading book,
Play football,
volleyball, travel.
